positive_examples: This is an example of epidemic model.
The epidemic model demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed epidemic model in this context.
A typical case of epidemic model would involve these features.
The concept of epidemic model applies here.
A mathematical model used to study the spread of infectious diseases through populations, such as SIR or SEIR models.
negative_examples: This is an example of mathematical pendulum, not epidemic model.
This represents mathematical model in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MathematicalPendulum, or other types of MathematicalModel

definition: A mathematical model describing the spread of infectious diseases through populations.
